The story, which has a consistent theme of \"What is friendship?'', develops while thoroughly denying the self-centeredness and rationalism that were prevalent in society at the time. It's a work full of Ikki-ism... no, it's full-on! Also, one of the highlights is that the words of historical figures are quoted throughout the work.\nI would like many manga fans to experience this \"bible of friendship'' that quietly but surely shined in the history of manga.\n\n[Synopsis]\nShinpei Ryoma, a hot-blooded man who transferred from Kochi to a junior high school in Tokyo, dreams of joining hands with big-hearted men and building wonderful friendships like the series of mountains.\nRyoma acts without compromising his beliefs. Tatsächlich gibt sie ihm sogar ihren Segen dafür, sich auszutoben, solange er sich nicht in ihre Angelegenheiten einmischt. Leider macht es nicht so viel Spaß, ein Playboy zu sein, wenn die Verlobte einem die Erlaubnis dazu gibt. Und bedeutet das nicht, dass sie ihn auch betrügt? Und so entschließt sich Cárcel, Inés’ Meinung über ihn zu ändern und zu beweisen, dass er der Ehemann sein kann, den sie immer wollte.\n\n---\nNote: The webtoon is released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.\n\n[Original Novel](https://ridibooks.com/event/15574)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%80-%EC%96%B4%EC%B0%A8%ED%94%BC-%EB%A7%9D%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%98%EC%96%B4-%EC%9E%88%EB%8B%A4/3066), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60493041)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-broken-ring)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14879/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%80%99%E5%A0%B4%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB%E6%B3%A8%E5%AE%9A%E5%87%8B%E9%9B%B6/391)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/book/the-broken-ring-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/book/the-broken-ring-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Broken-Ring-This-Marriage-Will-Fail-Anyway/626)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/114443)\n* [Portuguese / Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/the-broken-ring-um-casamento-fadado-ao-fracasso-webtoon/430/)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1/486)","en":"When six-year-old Inés laid eyes on the handsome heir to House Escalante, she promptly made the boy her fiancé. Since noblemen are all the same, she figured she might as well choose a pretty one. But Lord Cárcel isn't ready for this sort of commitment just yet, and he spends the next decade and a half avoiding the marriage at all costs! Luckily, that's no trouble for Inés, as this marriage failing is exactly what she wants. In fact, he has her blessing to sow his wild oats as long as he stays out of her business. Unfortunately, being a playboy isn't as fun when your fiancée gives you permission. And doesn't this mean she's cheating on him too? Now, Cárcel is determined to change Inés' mind about him and prove he can be the husband she's always wanted.\n\n---\nNote: The webtoon is released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.\n\n[Original Novel](https://ridibooks.com/event/15574)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%80-%EC%96%B4%EC%B0%A8%ED%94%BC-%EB%A7%9D%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%98%EC%96%B4-%EC%9E%88%EB%8B%A4/3066), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60493041)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-broken-ring)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14879/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%80%99%E5%A0%B4%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB%E6%B3%A8%E5%AE%9A%E5%87%8B%E9%9B%B6/391)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/book/the-broken-ring-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/book/the-broken-ring-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Broken-Ring-This-Marriage-Will-Fail-Anyway/626)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/114443)\n* [Portuguese / Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/the-broken-ring-um-casamento-fadado-ao-fracasso-webtoon/430/)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1/486)","fr":"Lorsque la jeune Inés pose ses yeux sur l'héritier de la famille Escalante du haut de ses six ans, elle n'hésite pas un instant avant de demander à ce qu'il soit son fiancé. Comme les hommes nobles sont tous les mêmes, autant en choisir un beau, pas vrai? Mais le seigneur Cárcel n'est pas du genre fidèle, et il aimerait bien esquiver ce mariage... seulement, lorsque quelques années plus tard, il apprend qu'Inés se fiche bien de son amour et de sa fidélité après leur union, et qu'elle n'est pas éprise de lui comme il le pensait, Cárcel réalise qu'il n'était pas si désintéressé qu'il ne l'aurait cru. Il décide donc de prouver à sa future femme qu'il peut être un époux digne d'elle... sans se douter une seconde de ce qui avait bien pu pousser Inés à le choisir ainsi lorsqu'ils étaient enfants...\n\n---\nNote: The webtoon is released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.\n\n[Original Novel](https://ridibooks.com/event/15574)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%80-%EC%96%B4%EC%B0%A8%ED%94%BC-%EB%A7%9D%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%98%EC%96%B4-%EC%9E%88%EB%8B%A4/3066), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60493041)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-broken-ring)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14879/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%80%99%E5%A0%B4%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB%E6%B3%A8%E5%AE%9A%E5%87%8B%E9%9B%B6/391)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/book/the-broken-ring-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/book/the-broken-ring-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Broken-Ring-This-Marriage-Will-Fail-Anyway/626)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/114443)\n* [Portuguese / Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/the-broken-ring-um-casamento-fadado-ao-fracasso-webtoon/430/)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1/486)","id":"Dia bilang setelah kami menikah nanti, aku bahkan bisa lebih bebas daripada saat ini? Já que homens nobres são todos iguais, ela imaginou que poderia pelo menos escolher um bonito. Mas lorde Cassel ainda não estava pronto para esse tipo de compromisso, e passou uma década e meia evitando o casamento de todo jeito! Felizmente, isso não era problema para a Inês, porque a falha neste casamento era exatamente o que ela queria. Na verdade, ele tinha a permissão dela para fazer o que quisesse, contanto que ficasse fora dos assuntos pessoais dela. Infelizmente, ser um playboy não é divertido quando se tem a permissão da esposa. E isso não significa que ela o está traindo também? Agora, Cassel está determinado a mudar a ideia que Inês tem na cabeça sobre ele e provar que ele pode ser o marido que ela sempre quis.\n\n---\nNote: The webtoon is released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.\n\n[Original Novel](https://ridibooks.com/event/15574)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%80-%EC%96%B4%EC%B0%A8%ED%94%BC-%EB%A7%9D%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%98%EC%96%B4-%EC%9E%88%EB%8B%A4/3066), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60493041)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-broken-ring)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14879/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%80%99%E5%A0%B4%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB%E6%B3%A8%E5%AE%9A%E5%87%8B%E9%9B%B6/391)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/book/the-broken-ring-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/book/the-broken-ring-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Broken-Ring-This-Marriage-Will-Fail-Anyway/626)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/114443)\n* [Portuguese / Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/the-broken-ring-um-casamento-fadado-ao-fracasso-webtoon/430/)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1/486)","uk":"Шестирічна Інес звертає увагу на красеня-спадкоємця дому Ескаланте та оголошує його своїм нареченим. Оскільки усі знатні чоловіки для неї однакові, вона подумала, що могла хоча би вибрати гарненького. Але лорд Карсель ще не готовий до такого роду зобов’язань. Він проводить наступні півтора десятиліття, уникаючи шлюбу за будь-яку ціну!\nНа щастя, для Інес це не проблема, оскільки фіаско цього заміжжя — це саме те, чого вона хоче. Таким чином Карсель отримує благословення на походеньки, допоки він не втручається у її бізнес.\nТа, на жаль, бути плейбоєм не так весело, коли ваша наречена дає вам дозвіл. І чи не означає це, що вона теж йому зраджує? Тепер Карсель налаштований змінити думку Інес про нього і довести, що він може бути чоловіком, якого вона завжди хотіла.\n\n---\nNote: The webtoon is released as R15, it's not R19 like the 8bcdbfe3-3424-4978-a48d-17d1b968ddd7:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"8bcdbfe3-3424-4978-a48d-17d1b968ddd7","title":{"en":"The Spearmaster and the Black Cat"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Stranger and Black Cat"},{"ja-ro":"Yaritsukai to, Kuroneko"},{"ja":"槍使いと、黒猫"}],"lastChapter":"27","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"After a tear in reality pulls Kagari Shuya into a white room he discovers a futuristic interface for reincarnating in a different world. After looking through the different races and skills he unlocks a new race, Lucivault, a type of vampire with none of its characteristic weaknesses. All set to start his life in a new world, Shuya is confused to discover that he is enveloped in darkness. As it turns out something went wrong when he was transported and instead of appearing where he was supposed to, he appeared in an underground cave. Shuya faces untold dangers, runs for his life, before finding his way out of the underground world. After escaping he meets his Shishou and begins to learn to fight with a spear. There is also a cute black cat named Rollo."},"links":{"al":"104659","ap":"yaritsukai-to-kuroneko","bw":"series/203666","mu":"154146","nu":"the-spearmaster-and-the-black-cat","raw":"https://comic.pixiv.net/works/5270"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Kendisi, bilgi birikimi, kültür, asalet, aşçılık ve dövüş sanatları konusunda mükemmeldir. On iki yaşındaki egoist efendisi için simsiyah kuyruklu takım elbisesi savrulup durmaktadır. İşte size dünyanın en iyi çayını yapan kahyasının mangası…","vi":"Câu chuyện diễn ra vào thời Victoria. Ở ngoại thành London có một toàn lâu đài nguy nga vốn là nơi ở của gia tộc Phantomhive. Hiện giờ chủ nhân của toàn lâu đài đó là bá tước Ciel Phantomhive, một đứa trẻ mới 12 tuổi nhưng lại là người đứng đầu gia tộc Phantomhive, đồng thời cũng là người đứng đầu thế giới ngầm. Bên cạnh cậu lúc nào cũng có Sebastian Michaelis - một quản gia cực kỳ tài giỏi và luôn tuân theo mọi mệnh lệnh của cậu. Tuy nhiên, bọc sau lớp vỏ một quản gia, Sebastian thật sự không phải là con người, mà là một con quỷ. Sở dĩ một con quỷ chấp nhận làm một quản gia bình thường là vì Sebastian đã ký kết một “hợp đồng” với Ciel. Nội dung bản hợp đồng đó chính là Sebastian sẽ trở thành sức mạnh của Ciel, luôn trung thành phục vụ Ciel cho đến khi Ciel trả được mối thù giết cha mẹ. Đổi lại, sau khi Ciel trả thù xong, tức lúc bản hợp đồng kết thúc, thì Sebastian sẽ nuốt chửng linh hồn của Ciel xem như là thù lao. Dấu hiệu thể hiện hợp đồng đã được ký kết nằm trong con mắt phải của Ciel và trên mu bàn tay trái của Sebastian. Trong thời gian ở lại bên cạnh cậu chủ của mình, Sebastian đã cùng cậu chủ phá nhiều vụ án và trải qua nhiều cuộc phiêu lưu. Từ đó, nhiều bức màn bí mật dần dần được hé mở. 8bf4888e-9334-4ed3-9525-7638ce5e05c3:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"8bf4888e-9334-4ed3-9525-7638ce5e05c3","title":{"en":"National Kid"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ナショナル・キッド"}],"description":{"en":"Highly recommended by Yoshikazu Takeuchi! A messenger of\njustice who soars through the skies and soars into space! His name is National Kid !\n\nSynopsis\nSuddenly, a mysterious disk attacked the National Diet Building. The mysterious disk explains that \"Three Z Abbeyka\" from Venus is admonishing the Earth, which has repeatedly conducted atomic and hydrogen bomb tests. A destroyed city, people who develop space sickness one after another. Furthermore, even Dr. Mizuno, who is trying to create a vaccine for the space disease, is kidnapped by \"Three Z Abika\"...\nJust when you think you're in a desperate situation, National Kid appears to confront the saucer!\n\nSpecial commentary by Mr. Yoshikazu Takeuchi\nIn order to protect the justice and peace of the earth, our national kid has fought fierce battles over land, sea and air with monsters and such as the Venusian Inca and the undersea demon Nercon. As soon as it was televised in 1960, it became extremely popular among children. The secret to its popularity is, above all, the coolness of Kid, who can realistically fly around the sky. What supported such a surprising flight scene was special effects technology using a one-shot camera developed by Konishi Roku (currently Konica Minolta), which was groundbreaking at the time. By directly synthesizing the actor who plays Kid and the live-action aerial shot scene, we have created a screen that has never been seen before in the history of television.\nThis popular hero was, of course, made into a manga by master Daiji Ichimine, contributing to the increased circulation of the magazine Bokura. The unique touch of Daiji Ichimine, who took the world by storm with his dynamic style of painting, is full of power and charm that makes your hands sweat even when you read it again now. It is an entertainment work recommended not only for nostalgic manga fans and Ichimine fans, but also for special effects fans and transforming hero fans."},"links":{"mu":"7kjgvf7"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}}]}

They end up going to a very boring school trip to Nara and are pleased to discover that in the neighborhood inn, there is another class renting the place at the same time, from an all-boy school. So, this is it, the girls last chance to seek love before going back to school.  \n  \nStory 5: Rabu + Kuro~Love\u0026Clothes – by Tada Manami: Matsumi Katou is a normal 25 years old housewife. So she starts skipping classes together with Yoshi and ends up spying on other couples instead of leaving her own love story. The Temple  \nThe story is narrated as a \"found manuscript\" penned by Karl Heinrich, Graf von Altberg-Ehrenstein, a lieutenant-commander in the Imperial German Navy during the days of World War I. It documents his untimely end at the bottom of the ocean. Altberg begins by declaring that he has decided to document the events leading up to his final hour in order to \"set certain facts\" before the public, aware that he will not survive to do so himself.  \n  \n2. The Hound  \nThe story focuses around the narrator and his friend St. John, who have a deranged interest in robbing graves. They constantly defile crypts and often keep souvenirs of their nocturnal expeditions. Since they reside in the same house, they have the opportunity to set up a sort of morbid museum in their basement. Using the objects they collect from the various graves they have robbed, they organize the private exhibition. The collection consists of headstones, preserved bodies, skulls, and several heads in different phases of decomposition. It also included statues, frightful paintings, and a locked portfolio bound in tanned human-skin.  \n  \n3. The Nameless City  \nThe Nameless City, of the story's title, is an ancient ruin located somewhere in the deserts of the Arabian Peninsula, and is older than any human civilization. In ancient times, the Nameless City was built and inhabited by an unnamed race of reptiles with a body shaped like a cross between a crocodile and a seal with a strange head common to neither, involving a protruding forehead, horns, lack of a nose, and an alligator-like jaw. These beings moved by crawling; thus, the architecture of the city has very low ceilings and some places are too low for a human being to stand upright. Their city was originally coastal, but, when the seas receded, it was left in the depths of a desert. This resulted in the decline and eventual ruin of the city."},"links":{"al":"97718","ap":"hp-lovecrafts-the-hound-and-other-stories","bw":"dea69caeed-40ae-4811-81ef-d6ad8260760e","engtl":"https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/29-293","kt":"37755","mal":"90109","mu":"114314"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Contains the following:\n\n- **Joe's Visitor** (ジョーを訪ねた男, Joe o Tazuneta Otoko)\n- **The Cliff of Death** (野郎と断崖, Yaro to Dangai)\n- **The Duel at Grand Mesa** (グランドメサの決闘, Grand Mesa no Ketto)\n- **Cape Uroko** (うろこが崎, Urokogasaki)\n- **The Voice of Night** (夜の声, Yoru no Koe)\n- **The Hole** (そこに穴があった, Soko ni Ana ga Atta)\n- **Chameleon** (カメレオン)\n- **The Cat's Blood** (猫の血, Neko no Chi)\n- **Valley of Bliss** (わが谷は未知なりき, Waga Tani wa Michinariki)\n- **Illicit Love** (暗い窓の女, Kurai Mado no Onna)\n- **Catastrophe in the Dark** (カタストロフ・イン・ザ・ダーク)\n- **Phone** (電話, Denwa)\n- **Rovanna** (ロバンナよ, Rovanna yo)\n- **Lovers Under the Air** (ふたりは空気の底に, Futari Kuki no Soko)\n\nAlso included in some editions are:\n\n- **The Execution Ended at 3** (処刑は3時におわった, Shokei wa 3-ji ni Owatta)\n- **Miraculous Conception** (聖女懐妊, Seijo Kainin, ALT. Он понимает, что получил способность обращать время вспять в случае своей смерти и принимает решение спасти девушку от неминуемой смерти во чтобы то ни стало!"},"links":{"al":"87259","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074CDMYVN","ap":"rezero-starting-life-in-another-world-chapter-3-truth-of-zero","bw":"series/153826/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/342676/","engtl":"https://yenpress.com/9780316559478/rezero-starting-life-in-another-world-chapter-3-truth-of-zero-vol-1-manga/","kt":"35974","mal":"89960","mu":"122146","nu":"rezero-kara-hajimeru-isekai-seikatsu","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02000031010000_68/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}
